  • Method Details

    • getAllTrends

      List<Trend> getAllTrends()
      Retrieves all trends from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all trends or an empty list if none are found.

    • getTrendById

      Trend getTrendById(Long trendId)
      Fetches a specific trend based on its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      trendId - The unique identifier of the desired trend.
      Returns:
      The trend matching the provided ID or null if not found.

    • addTrend

      Long addTrend(Trend trend)
      Adds a new trend to the database.
      Parameters:
      trend - The trend entity to be stored.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added trend or null if the addition failed.

    • updateTrend

      boolean updateTrend(Long trendId, Trend trend)
      Updates an existing trend's details in the database.
      Parameters:
      trendId - The ID of the trend to be updated.
      trend - The trend entity containing the updated details.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the update was successful.

    • deleteTrend

      boolean deleteTrend(Long trendId)
      Removes a trend from the database based on its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      trendId - The unique identifier of the trend to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the deletion was successful.

    • associateTrendWithCategory

      boolean associateTrendWithCategory(Long trendId, Long categoryId)
      Associates a trend with a specific category in the database.
      Parameters:
      trendId - The unique identifier of the trend.
      categoryId - The unique identifier of the category.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the association was successful.

    • dissociateTrendFromCategory

      boolean dissociateTrendFromCategory(Long trendId, Long categoryId)
      Dissociates a trend from a specific category in the database.
      Parameters:
      trendId - The unique identifier of the trend.
      categoryId - The unique identifier of the category.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the dissociation was successful.

    • getTrendsByCategory

      List<Trend> getTrendsByCategory(Long categoryId)
      Retrieves trends associated with a specific category.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The unique identifier of the category.
      Returns:
      A list of trends associated with the provided category.

    • getTrendsByDesigner

      List<Trend> getTrendsByDesigner(Long designerId)
      Fetches trends associated with a specific designer.
      Parameters:
      designerId - The unique identifier of the designer.
      Returns:
      A list of trends associated with the given designer.

    • getTrendsByLocation

      List<Trend> getTrendsByLocation(String location)
      Retrieves trends originating or popular in a specific location.
      Parameters:
      location - The location (city, country, etc.) to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of trends popular or originating from the provided location.

    • getTrendsBySeason

      List<Trend> getTrendsBySeason(String season)
      Fetches trends based on their popularity in a given season.
      Parameters:
      season - The season (e.g., "Summer", "Winter", etc.) to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of trends popular during the provided season.

    • setTrendPopularity

      boolean setTrendPopularity(Long trendId, int score)
      Sets the popularity score of a specific trend.
      Parameters:
      trendId - The unique identifier of the trend.
      score - The popularity score to be set.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the score setting was successful.

    • getTrendPopularity

      int getTrendPopularity(Long trendId)
      Fetches the popularity score of a specific trend.
      Parameters:
      trendId - The unique identifier of the trend.
      Returns:
      The popularity score of the provided trend.
